FILE: cm255355v11.0.txt
DYAD: GERMANY/PRUSSIA-BULGARIA
RIVALRY: RIV10687 ISOLATED 
DISPUTE(S): MID3858 MID3868 MID3827 

PS: 19081005-19401010 .5 19401011-19450507 0.25 19450508-19500507 0.5 20070101-20209999 1.0 

PS-UPDATE2020: Revision based on a new relationship rule that when a rivalry terminates and the rivalry is the only basis for a relationship, then the relationship continues for 5 years and is coded as negative peace (.5) and then the relationship ends thereafter.



PSNOTES: On 1 January 2007, Romania and Bulgaria became EU members. 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220225
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220225

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

WWII MIDs: MID258 MID3858 MID3868 MID3827

RIVNOTES: 
RIV10687: MID258 removed in because does not appear in the COW dyadic 3.1 data or the Maoz 2.0 dyadic data. 

RIV10687 is coded isolated because all MIDs are related to WWII.

NARRATIVE-CM:
German troops entered Bulgaria beginning on February 12, 1941. Bulgaria joined the *Tripartite Pact* on March 1, 1941. Bulgaria declared war against Germany on September 8, 1944. Bulgarian troops attacked German troops in Yugoslavia.

SOURCES-CM: 
Clodfelter, 1992, 835-836; Ference, 1994, 61-102.

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

MARITIME-MIDS:

MARITIME-DISPUTE:
